item.title: Sleep
item.description: I have heard Matthew Walker talk about sleep, a lot. But I never really took him seriously. I find him preachy and his talks are always exaggerated. The first time I got really curious about sleep is when I heard this talk: One of the silver linings of this depressing lockdown is that this has given me a lot of time to reflect and introspect, look inwards as they say. I have developed supernatural observational and organizational skills.
